description:
When creating a new HTTP connector the values provided for minSpareThreads,
maxSpareThreads and maxThreads attributes are lost in the server.xml file after
commiting changes.

Steps to reproduce:
1/ Create a HTTP connector with the Tomcat Administration Tool. Feel in values
for the minSpareThreads, maxSpareThreads and maxThreads attributes.
2/ Click on Save button
3/ Click on Commit Changes button
4/ Check newly created <connector> item in server.xml file: missing above
configuration attributes
summary: Missing configuration attributes for HTTP connector, when persisting the configuration
